嬹字的基本解释

嬹
xìng
古同“兴”，喜爱；喜欢。

嬹字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xìng］
［《廣韻》許應切，去證，曉。］
同“興1”。
喜悦；喜爱。
[②]［xīng］
［《集韻》虚陵切，平蒸，曉。］
女子名用字。

嬹字的康熙字典解释

【丑集下】【女字部】　嬹； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页273第20
【廣韻】【集韻】?許應切，興去聲。【說文】悅也。　又【集韻】虛陵切，音興。義同。一曰女字。

嬹字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
嬹字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Duo
xìng
Gu Tong "xing", love; love.
Duo
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xìng］
["Guangyun" Xu Yingqie, go to prove, Xiao. ]
Same as "Xing 1".
Joy; love.
[②]［xīng］
["Ji Yun" Xu Ling cut, flat steamed, dawn. ]
Women's names use words.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chou Ji 2] [Female Character Department] 　嬹; Kangxi Strokes: 18; Page Number: Page 273-20
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Xu Yingqie, Xing Qusheng. [Said the text] Yue Ye.　[Jiyun] Xuling cuts, sound is prosperous. The same meaning. One is the female character.
